website_summaries.verdict: Designed for the serious lifter, this bench comes with all the bells and whistles you could want.
pros: Comes with preacher curl and crunch handle attachments
Adjustable weight rack can act as bench press bar or squat rack
Comfortable foam backrest with flat, incline, or decline positions
U-shaped front leg stabilizer is designed to provide extra stability and safety
cons: Suggested bench max is 180 pounds, so this isn't the bench for heavy lifters

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I give this a 4/5. The packaging was done well didn't come all beat up. Its a good price for a bench that's comes with leg and arm curl attachments that are easy to remove. The instructions were clear nothing confusing. The reason why it's not a 5/5 is because the bench lettering was messed up a little, and some of the bars were bent a little, nothing super bad to were it needs to be replaced. The tools that came with it sucked so I bought my own and it made it 10x easier. They are included In the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Good bench!
customer_reviews.text: Decent first bench, didnt take long to build maybe two hours. I am a tall person (6'6") so I was skeptical but it fits alright for me. The leg extension is the only thing I cant get a decent position on. If you need a bench to hold olympic weights this will work ok. The adapter for the leg extension slides off easy and is not fixed to the smaller diameter weight holders. The holders in the sides of the bench are about 1" in diameter (smaller than the bore of an olympic plate) but are holding 35/25/10 just fine. I am happy with this bench.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Good multi-use bench for at home
customer_reviews.text: This bench is nice and solid. Sits nice with no wobble. It does seem a bit compact though because of the curling bench, so a taller individual may not like it as much. I would have given it 5 stars, but the hamstring curl bar isn't adjustable. I'm 5'5" and the pads will simply roll over my ankles and fall if I try to use it. Someone a few inches taller may be fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass
customer_reviews.text: 1. DO NOT BUY IF YOU ARE TALL. The leg extension is ridiculous, doesn't feel secure, and is unable to fit your legs comfortably if you're taller than 6'. Feels cheap in general. 2. The bench is unable to be moved or repositioned. 3. Despite the company name being superservicealways, their customer service is not super and now I'm stuck with a machine I can't use. Just save yourself the headache and $$ & buy from a company that actually sells and backs a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Licht

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This bench is worthless, it is way too narrow so the barbel markers where you would normally put your hand/grip sits right on the metal holders. It is way too narrow so it makes it impossible to use it properly. I can't imagine this major oversight in the design and its basically worthless!! Bad design. It works if you use and extremely narrow grip. I would love a more suitable replacement that was designed correctly. Do not recommend this product at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Love Hawaiian Food

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality control
customer_reviews.text: The leg lift part wouldn't fit on how it was shipped to me. The metal space it was meant to fit into was completely bent out on one side so the bolt provided was too short. Also the part you lay down on is rock hard and way too thin. Wear size medium shirts and I have to really balance to try and stay on it and not fall off. Edit: Still a horrible product I could never recommend, but great customer service from Amazon at least.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: you'll need your own socket set and an open-end adjustable wrench for best results. ) But
customer_reviews.text: All parts arrived intact...nothing missing. Assembling instructions were clear - well laid out. (You cannot use the tools supplied with the product; you'll need your own socket set and an open-end adjustable wrench for best results.) But, it went together cleanly, easily...just took some time. Keep in mind, this is not the bench to take you to the "Ah-nuld" level of body building. This is a light-weight, get-into-better-condition-than-you-are-now bench. I think it's great for youth-level (up to 18) or us older guys just trying to tone up and improve conditioning. You want to bulk up en masse? Then join a gym.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Try Another Weight Bench
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed in this weight bench. I'm 5'10" and can barely make it work. My feet brush the floor as I try to use the leg developer. I can't bench press without hitting the vertical supports. The leg developer wobbles. Also there are no instructions on how to use the ab attachment. I wish I could return the bench press but would really hate to take it apart after spending 1-5 hours to assemble it, and not to mention try to get it back into the box. But if I can't make it work I may just have to do that, and find a better one elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: joserdos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price. I had it for about three days it is very sturdy and it holds my 7 foot 45 pound Olympic bar very well and the is no shakiness when moving around the set. The metal is that makes of the set is high quality. A few words on the assembly process: It is very straightforward check my pictures below. The only issue is that the set is missing two nylon nuts that I had to go to Home Depot to purchase. Other than this the the assembly is straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Assembly & User friendly
customer_reviews.text: Been using this weight bench for about 6 months. It was pretty straight forward in assembly and getting it usable. This bench gave me a lot of options to add elements into my routine. It is sturdy, comfortable, and user friendly. By adding different elements I have been able to target additional parts of my body successfully and I have the results to show it. One word of caution - you will need a minimum of a 72" bar for this bench. I ordered a CAP threaded barbell at the same time (through Amazon) that I ordered the bench. They make a great combo.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Preacher curl attachment is not adjustable in length or as sturdy as I would have hoped for but it works ...
customer_reviews.text: Not an Olympic bench, it may be adapted too be used with Olympic weights but the width of the rack makes any bench grip uncomfortable except close grip. Wish I had known this before purchase. Preacher curl attachment is not adjustable in length or as sturdy as I would have hoped for but it works well enough. If I had to buy another bench with leg attachment I would definitely look for another option.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander J Roppe

customer_reviews.title: Nice nice
customer_reviews.text: Great price for what it is. Decline, flat and incline bench. Leg developer for leg curls as well as hamstring curls ( lay on stomach) and theirs even a preacher curl! so that is a lot of muscles you can target for an almost full body workout. Assembly wise this was pretty easy. Instructions are clear cut and they fit well with each other. My only gripe was that the tool they give you was a load of crap to tighten the screws with. The way the screws work you need to hold one side down and screw the other side. Very annoying, your better off using your own wrench or power drill with a socket attachment if possible
customer_reviews.author: Pliego

customer_reviews.title: Solid and stable
customer_reviews.text: Overall I enjoy the bench. The only complaint would be to make the small weight storage bars a little stronger. One has already bent. Better to use smaller weights and don't put much weight on them. The bench is stable and moves very little. Good product for home and for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: G.R.G.

customer_reviews.title: This is very small, young teen size
customer_reviews.text: This bench is for a young teenager and even then might be to small. Very disappointed. It had the best reviews of even ones that went up to over $400 so I went with it, and it would be a decent bench if it weren't so small. The quality is pretty decent for the price and for a smaller person it would be a good addition for the money. But if your 6' tall like me this will be very small and tight and narrow for you, trust me
customer_reviews.author: THUMPER

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to get my boyfriend & I through quarantine while the gyms are closed & found this. It's perfect for me cos I'm a small girl, however, if you're over 6'0, it might be a little too small. It was just right for my bf, he baaarely fits lol. Took about 2.5 hours to put together, comes with a loooooot of pieces. Pretty sturdy! Overall, we're happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly sturdy, but takes awhile to assemble. It took two of us over two hours to fully assemble this. When assembling, the screws weren't even the right size and had to be forced in at the expense of our hands. However, once you get it assembled, it's great quality! Olympic grade steel and stability. Make sure you have an Olympic sized bar to use with this, or you won't get much use out of it. It also takes up plenty of room, so make sure you have the space. Very sturdy!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good for a teenager. Can barely hold 200 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’8” and this is to small for me. The barbell grip is too narrow and I barely fit on the bench. My feet constantly hit the ground when doing leg extensions. The reason I have it 4 stars is because I only paid $200 for it. I would be scared to put more than 200 lbs on the bench press.
customer_reviews.author: No Way Jose

customer_reviews.title: Nice and solid the only thing I don't like is ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice and solid the only thing I don't like is the lenght of the bench that you lay on I am 6ft 4 and it is tight for me when leaning back to do press I come real close with my head bit for the money I love it
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Given the value, I was incredibly impressed by this product. It’s sturdy, well made, and seemingly no cheap components. My ONLY 2 complaints are that the provided tools can be incredibly frustrating to work with (I’d use a ratchet regardless), however, they could reach everywhere they needed to, with at least enough area to allow them to move around and tighten bolts. Furthermore, the stands for the bar aren’t as wide as I thought, but they aren’t terrible. Being 6’5”, I have quite a long arm span, and this bench doesn’t allow me to do a wide grip. That being said, I guess it forces me to get that form locked down! Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Mytch

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little bench combo
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, sturdy, works as stated. Can't really adjust the leg extension or curl, but that's probably not a thing on home gyms like this. DEFINITELY avoid using their tools, they WILL destroy your hands. Thanks to all the reviews that showed what you'll need, that was helpful. I bought those tools for the first time ever and it was so necessary! Probably not a bad idea to use a Power tool to tighten. Directions were easy to follow. Pictured is the set, look bottom right, that's the tool they think you can use to pit all these pieces of metal together with. NOT!
customer_reviews.author: A. B.

customer_reviews.title: Solid bench for its price, great buy.
customer_reviews.text: It came several days early, pretty solid quality especially for the price tag. I didn’t use the tools provided, used my own. Instructions are straightforward, not complicated. One of the pieces was welded on the wrong side, if not for that, I would have rated 5 stars. I had to fix it on my own since it’s impossible to get ahold of anyone during the covid19 pandemic. It’s sturdy, versatile and exactly what I needed for home use during all gym closures. I’m pretty happy with the purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R.

customer_reviews.title: For my price it's alright. 244.00
customer_reviews.text: This bench is definitely sturdy. Love the preacher curl. They can improve on the 2inch conversion on the leg presses because it's not on as sturdy everytime I switch plate it slides off with the plate. The bench is definitely higher than your average bench at the gym because this is a multi purpose bench its okay... u just wont have the perfect form. Its definitely a good buy for someone looking to get a bench if you get it for a good price. I was lucky enough to grab one for 244 at these crazy Rona prices.
customer_reviews.author: Chang Xiong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a birthday gift for my 15 year old son and he loves it!!. He and I put it together, it took about 2 hours. I would say the quality is perfect for a beginner, its not a super heavy duty weight bench, but perfect for younger teenage boys just starting to work out! Both of my sons and their friends use it pretty much every day in our garage and it has held up with no issues. I did use my own tools to put it together, the one they sent with it doesn't really work. I would recommend this product to someone not looking for a heavy duty weight bench!
customer_reviews.author: Debra L.

customer_reviews.title: It's not as sturdy as I expected
customer_reviews.text: It's not as sturdy as I expected, although I placed weights in the slots, so it's at least being held down that way. I don't really trust the squat rack for this reason. It also takes up a good amount of space. The directions are easy but it was hard to put together. The tools they provide are pretty worthless; You'd be better off with your own wrench set. There's no way I'd take it apart to ship it back and it will do it's job but I wish I had spent a bit more on a better quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: It's very cheaply made, the metal pieces didn't align, so we had the use some force to get it where it needs to. Working on it is pretty difficult if you're above 6 ft. Very uncomfortable. I wouldn't recommend it, stick with a gym membership!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Home Use
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the sturdiness of the set. It feels very solid and has many individual workouts you can do. It took me alone about 2 1/2 hours to set up. The directions were very easy to follow except one part that It took me a bit to figure out. Overall I'm very pleased with this and would recommend it for beginners or just home use. The price is great for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: The Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good bench and a good value at $197. It's disturbing that I checked the price a week later, during the COVID-19 virus time period and the price had doubled to $399. Glad I bought it when I did since price gouging took effect a week later. It is sturdy enough for home use but does not feel safe at higher weights over 200 lbs. Also, the so called squat rack is way too low (I'm 6'1") for a taller person. Otherwise, I like this bench for the money.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: So far so good with the item
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with the item, came in fairly quick, about 1 hour to put together with our own tools. For the price it works great, I specifically got this machine to do leg work on, I am 5'1 and for the most part I can do most of what I wanted but being a little short the leg pieces don't adjust enough for me to get the right fit. I did know this when I bought it so this is no fault to the company. Over all I think it is worth the $
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia  Melo

customer_reviews.title: Very straight & simple workout 🏋🏻‍♀️ bench
customer_reviews.text: Very great buy. For the price it’s very good. Every piece is solid & do not feel like they’ll give out anytime soon. The size is big but if you have the room get this. If you’re tall like 6’6” you may not be too comfortable using this bench. I needed something quick & didn't want to spend too much for now so this worked out perfectly. I already had a bar & plates for it. I really love to workout my legs as well as the upper body so this has you set. All the pieces were there & I got this assembled within an hour. Again just a great buy 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: David Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: This thing SUCK
customer_reviews.text: None of the nuts fit, so I can't even put it together? Sure it might be a good bench, but if you can't even put it together, how am I suppose to use it?
customer_reviews.author: Fast Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Takes some time to put together, but it is still easy, and a solid bench.
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is the best bench for a small gym that you will be able to find. It has the most use, and the price is great. My only gripe is doing bench press itself. If you look at the bar behind the bench, it is pretty much shoulder level, so, you will have to adjust were you are sitting or else your elbows will hit it when you bring the bar down to you chest. I would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly with your own tool's.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble if you have your own tools , It took about 2hrs to put together assembly was fairly strait forward . The only issue I had was that it would have been nice to have it packed in a way where you assemble it as you unpack it . there is one safety issue for the bench press , there is no safety catch to place the bar if you get in trouble . of course you really should not go heavy when using the bench press if you do not have a spotter but still would have been nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Ammo7

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I purchased this one instead of going to a six $700 bench that wouldn't even meet the need
customer_reviews.text: Reasons for four stars instead of five stars the back cushion could be wider at least 2 in the bench press rack should be wider where you can get a full spread out grip other than that this is an amazing bench I enjoyed very much is well worth the money simple to put together real sturdy I could do multiple exercise without even changing the weights there's anything that I would add to it would be a squat rack on the back
customer_reviews.author: rudy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, no discernable wabble. A bit small for a 6' tall person with normal arms. You won't be doing wide grip anything, and it doesn't get the bar high enough to safely load the bar for incline barbell above my 50-60% range. Basically I end up losing stability getting the bar off the rack for incline, so hit a weight limit kind of low. However, for everything else, this bench is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Built and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: When you first open the box and see all the parts you may feel overwhelmed but it was relatively easy to put together. I say this as a person who is not handy and does not like any complex assembly. The instructions are well crafted. The bench is solid and sturdy. I had it done in under 2 hours. But that was using a standard socket wrench set. Throw away the assembly tool they give you. It's useless and virtually impossible to use on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wellwood

customer_reviews.title: Not bad and not Good
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this make sure you are ready to go to the hardware store. I had 5 bolts that would not fit the nuts due to being so damaged from how they had been made or just very cheap. Also, was missing one of the square tubes to hold the back bench on and had to get metal to make it work. If you are looking for one to get by till you save money up for a good one, this would be it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Long term review, great bench for the money, I'm a bit on the taller side so there's a few things that are meant for an average height person (legs). Great features, super stable, gets it done! Use a socket set for assembly to save a boatload of time during assembly
customer_reviews.author: Kris Muszynski

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! It took the installer about an hour and a half to put it together with no complaints and I have really enjoyed using it! It's sturdy and well engineered.Also it looks great,very professional looking ... I feel like i'm in the gym Lol I hope it last for a really long time ...I'll update in a few months. I've included pics...
customer_reviews.author: Duchess

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Extremely good weight bench and at a very good price. Very sturdy frame and easy to adjust for positive/negative incline. A couple of flaws, but nothing serious; The preacher cushion has a poorly designed fastening which leaves it a bit unsturdy, but not so much that it is an actual problem, and the cushion fabric is indeed on the cheap side, imitation leather that eventually starts peeling/flaking off. It takes a good bit of time to assemble, but its pretty straight forward and comes with all tools required, would still recommend a legitimate screwdriver and wrenches but they are not required. Honestly a very good bench for the price and pretty straight forward assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: WAY better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. It is much sturdier than I anticipated. Not complicated at all to assemble. Very versatile and high quality. It can take quite a bit of weight too. I have looked at other benches twice as expensive and they were of worse quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tristram

customer_reviews.title: True product
customer_reviews.text: After hrs of shopping and looking at reviews I bought this product a few months back and weights also. Took me about 30 min to put together with a drill by myself. I have about 180 lbs on bench including my weight so close to 400lbs and its really sturdy and doesn't wobble or give me any issues. Very satisfied. Thanx guys
customer_reviews.author: Rob C

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a fine product...
customer_reviews.text: Yes it's Chinese, but they got this mostly right. There is one glaring omission in the directions, but they are mostly clearly written and well-organized. This is ideal as a coronavirus bench. It's not public gym quality, but it does the job. Stay healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Guy DeZarn

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Solid, versitile, great bang for the buck. Wish the leg developer was adjustable but that might have put it out of my price range.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a Marcy bench that was easily 25 years old, and getting wobbly, with several cracked welds. (not the benches fault) I was able to assemble it in about an hour and found it to be very sturdy. All of the hardware included nylon locking nuts and I don't expect i'll have to keep tightening them up every couple of months. I'm using a 6 ft. Olympic bar due to the room size, and it still fits my old small dia. bar and weights as well. It was an excellent value for the money, as I know you can spend a lot more on professional type benches. I would recommend for most lifters except the extreme body builders.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I diffidently recommend this bench I no longer wanted to go to ...
customer_reviews.text: I diffidently recommend this bench I no longer wanted to go to the gym so we made a small home gym. We bought a barbell set some kettle bell A treadmill and now we're very very happy with our choices. The bench was not difficult to assemble and it arrived quickly. It's pretty sturdy. We really like it. We're beginners not professional so for us it works.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend, took him about 2.5 hour to fully put together. He’s been using it for a week now with no complaints so I assume he likes it. Only reason I took one star away is because when the box came te delivery dropped it on the gound with no care. The box was broken open from poor handling while shipping. Good thing nothing was broken
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Best Puzzle Ever - Assembled with just an adjustable socket wrench by a woman.
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman and I was able to put this together by myself with an adjustable socket wrench in about three hours, I think. I did not really time myself. You will have to use the little thing they include along with the wrench to get everything nice and tight. I love the attachment that lets you do seated rows. This will help me avoid that dreaded humped back that some women get from sitting over the computer all day. I give it two thumbs up. Best puzzle ever.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love,love this bench.very heavy duty for the price . bouth this bench for my teenage 15 year old son who is 5 ft 10 inches tall .he fits very comfortable on the bench.the bench is big enough to accomodate a bigger body frame .I am 6 ft 2 and I fit very comfortable on the bench.my son runs track and plays baseball and this will help maintain his physical strength durring the Corona virus. great value for the price.worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: daniel garay

customer_reviews.title: Good Value but not Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It works and works well for the most part. There's no range of motion to do leg extensions properly. Bench press is not easily configurable for bigger people. Also, not for large amounts of weight. I wouldn't put more than 225 on this bar and these posts.
customer_reviews.author: Cody S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, broke in no time
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality, base that holds the preacher curl looks like it was welded by a 10 year old in shop class. Broke within the first 2 months of use and of course trying to get anything from the manufacturer is like trying to golf with a pool noodle. Could have been hurt if it was to snap off completely while in use. Wobbly stands that hold the bench/squat bar as well. I know this is a cheaper starter set, but it's not even safe and breaks in no time. Look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Racchini

customer_reviews.title: Use your own tools!
customer_reviews.text: The good: It's solidly built, it allows you to do a large range of exercises, it's an excellent value, and it's visually appealing. The bad: The tool for tightening bolts is extremely uncomfortable to use. Use your own wrench and pliers. In addition, the bench gets quite wide towards the bottom. This means that you're not going to be able to put your legs comfortably on the ground unless you put them over the end of the bench.
customer_reviews.author: Nunchukenthuse

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'11" tall and this set is just right for me. Taller users may have a difficult time but I'm getting a lot out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: gumborg

customer_reviews.title: It's a really good bench
customer_reviews.text: It's not as good as the Marcy bench I had a few years ago and sold, but they don't make that one anymore and this one is definitely the best substitute at this price point. It's sturdy and has a lot of flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit okay
customer_reviews.text: The leg attachments are okay but lose all resistance from 80% or higher ROM The bench is okay but the high incline is straight death for my shoulders Other then that it’s a fine set up
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Busted parts on arrival but functional
customer_reviews.text: Came in quickly. Putting together took about 2 1/2 hours. The multitools included to assemble are trash you’re gonna want a couple adjustable wrenches. One of the screw in knobs was busted on arrival but is still functional. Another doesn’t quite screw in all the way. If I had any more issues I’d consider returning it but it’s functional as is.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Desaulniers

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for..
customer_reviews.text: Bench is very shaky, it’s not wide at all which causes you to pinch your hands when you rack the bar. Pads are really crappy, leg extension barely had any room for use. Priecher curl is ok, but the pad is so flimsy that it’s going to bend and break quickly. This bench is meant for very light weight. Far from on Olympic bench like it claims to be.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: very easy to strip the aluminum threads
customer_reviews.text: Be careful not to over tighten some of the bolts that screw into parts of the frame itself... very easy to strip the aluminum threads. Otherwise, great and affordable setup.
customer_reviews.author: P. Harris

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Except the assembly, everything seems to be great with this product. I had to hire Amazon home Services to assemble this product. The tools provided along with this is not enough to assemble...unless you have prior professional experience.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ghosh

customer_reviews.title: Home gym
customer_reviews.text: Set up the bench today. Instructions were straight forward. The use of a 17 & 15 mm socket and wrench is necessary. Tools included are no use. Seems like a sturdy piece of equipment. I would have liked it to be a little bigger but it is what it is and will be fine for a home workout. I added Golds Gym Olympic 300LBS weights and barbell to the bench. Its plenty of weight for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mayan Axelrod

customer_reviews.title: Entry level set
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Nice to use during a pandemic when the gym is closed. It won't fall apart but it is wobbly when assembled. The preacher curl is a bit loose. But it's worth it at its price point overall.
customer_reviews.author: MaciLou

customer_reviews.title: Ok for price point. My 13 year old assembled ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok for price point. My 13 year old assembled with minimal supervision from me. He says the ab attachment feels awkward and bothers his elbows. The preacher curl attachment on ours is stripped from the factory and can't be secured. Not real thrilled with the unit overall but price point was decent
customer_reviews.author: BoxBoy

customer_reviews.title: Better have socket set
customer_reviews.text: The bench might be great but after over an hour using these tools ive only gotten half way takes a good 10 minutes each bolt with these tools. If you buy this bench you might wanna buy a socket set as well, my set is small and doesnt fit them so ill buy a larger set because the tools they give you are worthless!!!
customer_reviews.author: BlondeDude

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy bench. I’m a big guy 6’1 230 pounds and can lift really heavy on this bench. However the only downfall of I should say would be the rack bars that hold the bar and weight up. It rocks a little bit when re-racking which makes me feel like it will collapse right on my face sometimes. It hasn’t happened and hope it won’t but that’s the only downfall I would say.
customer_reviews.author: Toa Leuta

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bench as an in garage exercise training tool for some neighborhood fellas who felt they had “outgrown” the bench we had been using for the past five years. So far, it has proven to be a wise purchase. The guys have become even more motivated relative to not missing”weight training” days and they seem to love all the new equipment.
customer_reviews.author: btw3073

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh..
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's this bench or the barbell I got, but I have to loosen the end caps that hold the barbell weights in place in order to set the barbell on the bench; it's really inconvenient...
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Ok buy
customer_reviews.text: Kinda hard to assemble doesn’t seem to sturdy but does what it’s supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super legit.
customer_reviews.text: This bench is legitimate. So many workouts you can preform and it seems super sturdy for me. Both my boyfriend and I use it constantly. Putting it together it’s hard persay.... just tedious.... took about two hours to put together butt it was exactly “hard”. Just time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Solid Weight Bench
customer_reviews.text: Great product, and it was easy to put together—just a little time consuming. With a weight set from Dick’s, you’ll have everything you need for a full body workout. Only complaint is the constant variance in price. The price fluctuates often, and amazon doesn’t honor that.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pandl

customer_reviews.title: It came in clutch!
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy to have this, my issue is it feels not too sturdy with the handles for pulling and curly, but beyond that maybe the size on the bench could be a bit longer so it’s not an issue to bench
customer_reviews.author: Odane Josephs

customer_reviews.title: Good buy! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy! Price is great. Versatility is perfect for home gym. The “squat rack” really is not usable for squats. I ended up buying a squat rack also. The box arrived damaged and some of the parts were damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow instructions. Took me about 1.5 hours and a glass of wine from front door to setup. I am pleased. And no. It does not come with weights. Any decent bench won’t.
customer_reviews.author: Jbird

customer_reviews.title: I workout
customer_reviews.text: Nice bench for the price. I definitely feel I got my money’s worth. If your a advanced weight lifter it’s not for you. The ab cruncher is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner bench press
customer_reviews.text: So I've been using this bench press for a little over a month and so far the bench and everything has kept up great no issues. Will update after some more use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Can't even assemble this product because while doing the very first instruction I am unable to tighted the nuts on the bolt, not with any tool it came with nor that I possess. It simply refuses to tighten. If I can't even use the product that I ordered because of faulty manufacturing this product deserves a one star rating. Go with a different manufacturer, maybe they'll care about quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Tamera L Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, But Bring your own tools!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bench for about 1 1/2 Weeks and overall the bench works just fine. But the tools provided for constructing the device were very lacking, two Ghetto Hex bolt Key tools, ur better off just using a socket wrench. The bench took me about 2 hours to fully install and my only compaint is the fact that the bench has a minor wobble when shaken or bumped abruptly, even with diligent retightening it still has a wobbalyness to it BUT for a $150 bench NOT BAD.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Cozman

customer_reviews.title: Good weight bench but the using it to squat is difficult
customer_reviews.text: Good weight bench but the using it to squat is difficult because the catches can not, at least for me, be set at a comfortable height. Consequently, one should consider using a dedicated squatting rack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonerr

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This workout bench combo is awesome much more sturdier than I expected, really solid piece of equipment
customer_reviews.author: George Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Quality Design
customer_reviews.text: So far very happy with it. Didnt have any issies with assembly or delivery at all. Everything came as described. Nice quality looking design and pretty sturdy for a 14 yo boy. He's loving it so far.
customer_reviews.author: justabusymom

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dollar
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult to put together but I eventually did it and now it's helping a few of us stay in shape at home during covid-19 and loving it
customer_reviews.author: Corinna

customer_reviews.title: Cant even assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I'd love to give you a review of how it works but NONE of the nuts fit the bolts. I shouldn't have to buy correct size nuts... cant even put the stupid thing together..
customer_reviews.author: Tavin

customer_reviews.title: Good item other then few scratches and a tear
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice only problem for buying a new machine is that it came with some scratches and a small tear on a cushion which will get bigger or time with normal usage .... who can I contact in order to get a replacement cushion with no tears ? Other then that pleased with the item
customer_reviews.author: christian robles

customer_reviews.title: Hubby says yes. He would definitely purchase this again
customer_reviews.text: Early Birthday gift for my husband & he loves it. It was delivered yesterday and he put it together last night & will start using it tonight...Day 1
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for home use
customer_reviews.text: Great bench. The only complaint is the leg lift attachment. It gets in the way at times but otherwise is a sturdy bench.
customer_reviews.author: M. Browning

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Good
customer_reviews.text: The seat of the bench and the back support don't line up so my back is always bent when doing bench press. The leg things can't be adjusted and don't work well for me at 5' 10". Better off just getting a flat bench and a curl bar.
customer_reviews.author: toorude89

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good ! My wife put this together by herself. It went smoothly with no big challenges. She really likes it but I haven’t been able to buy her the weights yet.
customer_reviews.author: ...jaynes ; )

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both use it. It’s easy to switch the positions and you can buy your weights and it fits perfectly! Does not come with a bar or weights. Thank god we had our own!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leg support CANT handle the weight
customer_reviews.text: Bench is great all-in-all except that it cant handle as little as 70lbs when doing leg curls. As soon as the first use it began to "creek". By the third use it gave in and cracked. I can no longer can utilize this bench for leg curls and possibly leg extensions which is about half my lower body workout.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Fragoza

customer_reviews.title: great spacing, perfect for people about 6 feet tall
customer_reviews.text: Solid frame, great spacing, perfect for people about 6 feet tall. I've lost 40 lbs in the last three months with this.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: BUY SOCKETS OR WRENCHES
customer_reviews.text: Its a good bench for the price. But I wish I had paid more attention to this comment on the reviews. The two "tools" it gives you to assemble make it absolutely horrible to assemble. With some sockets or wrenches though it would be a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Saldana

customer_reviews.title: Good bench. Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Good bench. Worth the money. Sturdy. You need a hand grip of less that 34 inches wide, which is fine. Attachments are useless. No movement when in use. I would recommend this bench.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this just before the COVID shutdown. The bench is easy to assemble and all parts work well. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: you might want to get someone to help you like I did or it might take lots longer
customer_reviews.text: husband loves it. my son and I put it together and it took about 2 hours with two working on it. you might want to get someone to help you like I did or it might take lots longer.
customer_reviews.author: jeanna hayes cook

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this it came with instructions all the bolts and ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this it came with instructions all the bolts and nuts and tools to use it they could be a little bit wider but other than that it is perfect for the amount of money that you spend on it the ab thing does kind of suck but that doesn’t matter I have an ab chair.
customer_reviews.author: john hastings

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: It get the job done. The backrest doesn’t stay snug and move a little, so does the curl arm rest
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy and well priced
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice little home gym set. took a couple of hours to put together, but not difficult. Now if I could just figure out a way for it to work me out when I feel lazy. :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Great workout bench
customer_reviews.text: So many exercises can be done with this. A few pieces missing upon assembly, contacted manufacturer & they sent parts right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Had to use a file to correct a slight machining error but that was the only problem.
customer_reviews.author: D green

customer_reviews.title: Great For The Price
customer_reviews.text: It's not as high of quality as you would find in a fitness center, but for the someone who is just getting back into working out it is great. Assembly was pretty easy and the bench itself is pretty sturdy. The only downside is that the armrest for the preacher curls is a bit wobbly, but not really a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Bartoszek

customer_reviews.title: Low cost and good aftercare
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in several days and product looks reliable and better than expected. One point I should mention is that as you can see in the pictuer, irregular welding ruined the lock system. However aftercare was almost perfect and they sent the replacement just in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: la central

customer_reviews.title: ... ton of money trying to figure out if I'd like it or not
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to the home gym thing and didn't want to invest a ton of money trying to figure out if I'd like it or not. This bench is exactly what I was looking for. It's really a great bench for the price! The pads aren't big gym quality but I didn't figure they would and I'm ok with that for the price. Super easy to put it together and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

product_meta.title: Body Champ BCB5860 Olympic Weight Bench with Preacher Curl, Leg Developer and Crunch Handle, Dark Gray/Black
product_meta.description: This heavy-duty 2.5-inch square tube bench press rack is built for the truly serious lifter. This is not your average machine or adjustable weight bench! Added attachments to this weight bench set are the high-density padding, Preacher Curl, and Crunch Handle for you to perform ab crunches for a great core workout. The bench racks are built for either 7- or 8-foot Olympic weight sets. The adjustable weight racks can work double duty as a bench press upright and adjustable squat rack. The racks have safety hooks along with the "no pinch" feature. The U-shaped front-leg stabilizer gives you added safety and stability during your workout. The high-density foam backrest can be put in the flat position as well as multiple decline and incline positions. The Leg Developer has oversized foam pads for safety and comfort, and an adapter allows you to use either standard or Olympic weight plates. The maximum weight limit is 300 lbs. Our products come with a clear instruction manual, and products can be built in just a few minutes. Grab your favorite weight sets, and get ready to use our favorite workout benches from home. Body Flex Sports is a private, family-owned company established in 1996. We’re dedicated to creating a gym-level fitness experience that makes it easy and affordable to take your health to the next level. We make gym equipment you can always depend on. We make a point of using premium-quality materials, state-of-the-art manufacturing processes, and strict quality control. We pride the health and well-being of Body Flex on the health and well-being of your body. Our ultimate goal is to bring true benefits and wholesome results to the strength, stamina, and soundness of your health. We measure our success according to this purpose and strive to achieve it through our team of incredible workers, extensive research, and development processes. When you want a gym-quality workout at home, choose Body Flex Sports.
feature_bullets: MADE FOR YOUR FITNESS GOALS: This multi-function, heavy-duty 2.5-inch square tube Olympic weight bench comes with added attachments and accessories for complete workout circuits

ENHANCED SAFETY AND COMFORT: The U-shaped front-leg stabilizer provides safety and stability during the workout. The racks have safety hooks on catches and a safe-grip feature to prevent your hands from getting pinched when re-racking

7-POSITION ADJUSTABLE BACKREST: This bench press has customizable features for ergonomic and optimal training positions, including an adjustable full-action Leg Extension/Leg Lifts Developer and an Arm Curl Bar with adjustable foam rollers

ATTACHMENTS INCLUDED: Accessories include the Plate Adapter, Spring Clip for Leg Developer, Preacher Curl Pad, Arm Curl Bar, and Ab Crunch with Foam Grip Handles Attachment. All are included with the set; no need to buy separately
COMPATIBILITY: This workout bench is compatible with most 6- and 7-foot weight sets. The length between collars of the bar you intend to use with this bench must be greater than 38.5"

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
